name: Optimized Panama
description:
Optimized has been in business in Panama since 2009 but service clients from all around the globe. Founder Michael Price has been building computer systems since 1983.
We are not interested in building you a website that just looks good – we want to build you a website that delivers you results. We are Google Partners and are one of the few businesses in Panama that offer the full range of Digital Marketing services including:
Website Design
Search Engine Optimization
Google Advertising
Photo and video
Social Media Marketing
Corporate image and publicity
Translations
What can you expect? Determination to put your business at the top of the search engines We’ve been helping our clients reach their goals since 2009
